明の明星: (あけのみょうじょう) - morning star; Lucifer; Venus in the morning sky
明へん: (あけへん) - useless; no good; hopeless
明らかにする: (あきらかにする) - to make clear; to clarify; to disclose; to make public
明らかになる: (あきらかになる) - to become clear; to be made public
明らむ: (あからむ) - to become luminous at dawn (esp. the sky)
明らめる: (あきらめる) - to elucidate; to shed light on; to clarify
明り: (あかり) - (明かり, 明り only) light/illumination/glow/gleam; lamp/light
明りとり: (あかりとり) - skylight; dormer; transom; dormer window
明り取り: (あかりとり) - skylight; dormer; transom; dormer window
明り窓: (あかりまど) - transom; skylight; dormer window
明る: (あかる) - to become bright; to become clear
明るい: (あかるい) - bright/colourful; cheerful; (as 〜に明るい) familiar (with)/knowledgeable (about); fair (e.g. politics)/clean
明るみ: (あかるみ) - bright (place); into the light
明るみにだす: (あかるみにだす) - to make public; to bring to light
明るみに出す: (あかるみにだす) - to make public; to bring to light
明るみに出る: (あかるみにでる) - to come to light
明るむ: (あかるむ) - to brighten; to be refreshed
明を失う: (めいをうしなう) - to lose one's eyesight
明初: (めいしょ) - (abbr. of 明治初年) first year of Meiji era
明刻: (ミンコ) - {mahj}  open three-of-a-kind (meld); three-of-a-kind made with a tile called from another player
明刻子: (ミンコーツ) - {mahj}  open three-of-a-kind (meld); three-of-a-kind made with a tile called from another player
明君: (めいくん) - wise ruler; enlightened monarch; benevolent lord
明哲: (めいてつ) - wisdom; sagacity; wise man
明哲保身: (めいてつほしん) - (yoji) wisdom and self-protection; wise and skilled in the art of self-protection
明太: (めんたい) - walleye pollack (Theragra chalcogramma) (kor: myeongtae)/Alaska pollack; walleye pollack roe (generally served salted and spiced with red pepper)
明太子: (めんたいこ) - walleye pollack roe (generally served salted and spiced with red pepper)
明察: (めいさつ) - discernment; penetration; insight; intellectual acumen
明店: (あきみせ) - empty house; empty shop
明弁: (めいべん) - (明弁, 明辨 only) discernment/clear analysis; (明弁, 明辯 only) clear expression/distinguished speech
明後年: (みょうごねん) - year after next
明後日: (みょうごにち) - day after tomorrow
明徳: (めいとく) - virtue; Meitoku era (of the Northern Court) (1390.3.26-1392.10.5)/Meitoku era (of reunified Japan) (1392.10.5-1394.7.5)
明快: (めいかい) - clear; clear-cut; lucid; unequivocal; explicit
明文: (めいぶん) - explicit statement (e.g. law); express provision
明文化: (めいぶんか) - stipulation; stating clearly; documenting in writing; stating explicitly
明断: (めいだん) - clear or definite judgement (judgment)
明日の事を言えば鬼が笑う: (あすのことをいえばおにがわらう) - (proverb) Nobody knows the morrow; speak of tomorrow and the demons laugh
明日の百より今日の五十: (あすのひゃくよりきょうのごじゅう) - A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
明日は明日の風が吹く: (あしたはあしたのかぜがふく) - Tomorrow will take care of itself
明日葉: (アシタバ) - Angelica keiskei (species of angelica, a herb of the parsley family)
明明: (あかあか) - brightly lit; brightly lighted; lit up; lighted up
明明後日: (みょうみょうごにち) - (yoji) (in) three days' time (two days after tomorrow)
明明白白: (めいめいはくはく) - (yoji) clearly evident; quite obvious; as clear as day; beyond any doubt; strikingly apparent
明星: (みょうじょう) - morning star/Venus; preeminent person (within their own field)/star (of the stage, silver screen, etc.)
明晰夢: (めいせきむ) - lucid dream (dreaming while knowing that you are dreaming)
明暗: (めいあん) - light and darkness; light and shade
明暗を分ける: (めいあんをわける) - to decide the outcome (e.g. game); to be very different/to be sharply contrasted
明暗両面: (めいあんりょうめん) - (yoji) (both) the bright and dark sides
明月: (めいげつ) - harvest moon; (明月 only) bright moon/full moon
明朗会計: (めいろうかいけい) - (yoji) clear accounting; honest accounting (billing); transparent billing practices (in restaurant and bar charges, etc.)
明朗快活: (めいろうかいかつ) - (yoji) cheerful and openhearted
明朗闊達: (めいろうかったつ) - (yoji) upbeat and freehearted; cheerful and magnanimous
明朝: (みんちょう) - Ming Dynasty; Ming-cho type(face)
明朝体: (みんちょうたい) - Ming-style typeface; Mincho
明楽: (みんがく) - Ming-era Chinese music (popularized in Japan during the early 17th century)
明治二十七八年戦役: (めいじにじゅうしちはちねんせんえき) - Meiji 27-28 Campaign (alternate name for the First Sino-Japanese war; 1894-1895)
明治十四年の政変: (めいじじゅうよねんのせいへん) - the failed Meiji-14 coup of 1881
明治憲法: (めいじけんぽう) - Meiji Constitution (Constitution of the Empire of Japan)
明治節: (めいじせつ) - Emperor Meiji's birthday (November 3rd; national holiday held from 1927 to 1948)
明清楽: (みんしんがく) - Ming & Xing-era Chinese music (as popularized in Japan before the First Sino-Japanese war)
明渡す: (あけわたす) - to vacate; to surrender
明烏: (あけがらす) - daybreak sound of a crow; (name of) poetry anthology
